text:
Great room. Stairs should be changed to a ramp to make it more accessible.

Cleanliness needs improving, quite dusty in some places.
Nice place to hold an intimate event,,, cosy

Held our daughters wedding at NSRCC Heron Ballroom.
Loving it!

Its a nice place to go play golf or if you wanna go cycling around. IF you have no transport of ur own, TAXI or GRAB is the best way. There is NO PUBLIC TRANSPORT like bus to get in to HERON. It is very secluded and far far in. If u must take a TAXI in and u r low on budget, take a TAXI from Tanah Merah Mrt Station.
